channel.title: Wtf?
channel.description: okay soo i made another mod of rimmington miner lolllll and its a cabage picker.... it clicks on the cabage and the action cursor turns red or what ever but it doesnt pick, it picks it when i click with my mouse but not when the script does it anyone know how to fix it?

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

I once wrote a cabbage picker. It’s the one you see in all of the script packs. It’s also a little buggy because the point of it was to teach people scripting, but I decided most people still wouldn’t be able to learn and gave up and just released it. And don’t forget that there are more than 1 actions that can be performed. In this case, you need to use

atObject(cabbageID, 2);

Hope that helps.

You can find the action IDs in ActionConstants.java Basically, if it says atObject5 in ActionConstants for that action ID, it’s going to be atObject(object, 5);

EDIT: cabbageID is not the object ID, it’s the number returned when using findObj

Read full topic
